Function reference

All functions

addGates()
Add Polygon Gates
applyBandpass()
Apply Bandpass Filter to Fluorescence Intensities
checkRepairFcsFiles()
Check and Repair FCS Files
cutFdmatToGate()
Cut 'fdmat' Object to Gate
drawGate()
Manually Draw Polygon Gate
exportFdmatData()
Export Fluorescence Distributions
fd_load()
Load Fluorescence Distribution 'fdmat' Object
fd_save()
Save Fluorescence Distribution 'fdmat' Object
fd_updateSettings()
Manually Update the Settings
flowdex
Extract Fluorescence Distribution Data from FCM Files and Recalculate to Events per Volume
flowdexit()
Read in FCS Files and Extract Data
genfs()
Generate Folder Structure
getEventsPerVolume()
Get Events per Volume Unit
makeAddGatingSet()
Make Gating Set and Add Gates
makeGatingSet()
Make Gating Set
makefdmat()
Extract Fluorescence Distribution Matrix
plotFlscDist()
Plot Fluorescence Distribution
plotgates()
Plot Gates on All Flowframes in a Gating Set
repairSID()
Repair a Single Sample ID
repairVolumes()
Repair Volume Values in FCS Files
setupSettings()
Perform Settings Setup

Developed by Bernhard Pollner.
